results.title: The Lives of Others
results.brief_description: A tragic love story set in East Berlin with the backdrop of an undercover Stasi controlled culture. Stasi captain Wieler is ordered to follow author Dreyman and plunges deeper and deeper into his life until he reaches the threshold of doubting the system.

constellations_other.name: Freedom from surveillance
constellations_other.description: Real world and cinematic authoritarianism and resistance explored through documentaries, Hollywood blockbusters, TV and videogames.

results.description: A tragic love story set in East Berlin with the backdrop of an undercover Stasi controlled culture. Stasi captain Wieler is ordered to follow author Dreyman and plunges deeper and deeper into his life until he reaches the threshold of doubting the system.
description_for_label: A tragic love story set in East Berlin with the backdrop of an undercover Stasi controlled culture. Stasi captain Wieler is ordered to follow author Dreyman and plunges deeper and deeper into his life until he reaches the threshold of doubting the system.

results.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
results.brief_description: Renowned oceanographer Steve Zissou has sworn vengeance upon the rare shark that devoured a member of his crew. He and his crew travel the sea, all too often running into pirates and, perhaps more traumatically, various figures from Zissou’s past, including his estranged wife, Eleanor.

constellations_other.name: Deep blue
constellations_other.description: Go deep on an exploration of real world oceans and those rendered by pixels and creatures made from plastics.

results.description: Renowned oceanographer Steve Zissou has sworn vengeance upon the rare shark that devoured a member of his crew. In addition to his regular team, he is joined on his boat by Ned, a man who believes Zissou to be his father, and Jane, a journalist pregnant by a married man. They travel the sea, all too often running into pirates and, perhaps more traumatically, various figures from Zissou’s past, including his estranged wife, Eleanor.
description_for_label: Renowned oceanographer Steve Zissou has sworn vengeance upon the rare shark that devoured a member of his crew. In addition to his regular team, he is joined on his boat by Ned, a man who believes Zissou to be his father, and Jane, a journalist pregnant by a married man. They travel the sea, all too often running into pirates and, perhaps more traumatically, various figures from Zissou’s past, including his estranged wife, Eleanor.

results.title: The Lego Movie
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros. Pictures, Warner Bros. Animation, Phil Lord, Christopher Miller and Animal Logic
results.brief_description: An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from gluing the universe together.

constellations_other.name: Flipping through the evolution of animation
constellations_other.description: Animation has come a long way since flip books were popular. These optical toys gave the illusion of movement, but now whole films and special effects are animated entirely through computers.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Warner Bros. Pictures, Warner Bros. Animation, Phil Lord, Christopher Miller and Animal Logic
results.description:
An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from gluing the universe together.

Phil Lord and Christopher Miller’s 2014 stop-motion animation blockbuster had audience declaring “Everything is awesome!” when it took the world by storm in 2014. Finally bringing the entire, beloved LEGO universe together in a family-friendly romp, it both delighted new viewers and rekindled nostalgia in lovers of the world-famous brick toys. Featuring an all-star cast, including Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks, Will Arnett, Nick Offerman, Alison Brie, Liam Neeson, and Morgan Freeman, it arrived “at a time when feature animation was looking and feeling mighty anemic…The LEGO Movie shows ‘em how it’s done”, according to The Hollywood Reporter.

It has since spawned a spin-off, The Lego Batman Movie (2017) and a direct sequel, The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019). In our new exhibition, The Story of the Moving Image, we take an in-depth look at character design by Animal Logic.
description_for_label:
An ordinary Lego mini-figure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil Lego tyrant from gluing the universe together.

Phil Lord and Christopher Miller’s 2014 stop-motion animation blockbuster had audience declaring “Everything is awesome!” when it took the world by storm in 2014. Finally bringing the entire, beloved LEGO universe together in a family-friendly romp, it both delighted new viewers and rekindled nostalgia in lovers of the world-famous brick toys. Featuring an all-star cast, including Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks, Will Arnett, Nick Offerman, Alison Brie, Liam Neeson, and Morgan Freeman, it arrived “at a time when feature animation was looking and feeling mighty anemic…The LEGO Movie shows ‘em how it’s done”, according to The Hollywood Reporter.

It has since spawned a spin-off, The Lego Batman Movie (2017) and a direct sequel, The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part (2019). In our new exhibition, The Story of the Moving Image, we take an in-depth look at character design by Animal Logic.

results.title: The Legend of Hell House
results.brief_description: A physicist and his wife, along with a young psychic and the only survivor of a previous visit to the notorious Hell House set out to prove life after death and solve the mystery of the haunted house.

constellations_other.name: The Suspense Constellation
constellations_other.description: An exploration of music in suspense works.

results.description: A team consisting of a physicist, his wife, a young female psychic and the only survivor of the previous visit are sent to the notorious Hell House to prove/disprove survival after death. Previous visitors have either been killed or gone mad, and it is up to the team to survive a full week in isolation, and solve the mystery of the Hell House.
description_for_label: A team consisting of a physicist, his wife, a young female psychic and the only survivor of the previous visit are sent to the notorious Hell House to prove/disprove survival after death. Previous visitors have either been killed or gone mad, and it is up to the team to survive a full week in isolation, and solve the mystery of the Hell House.

results.title: The Leftovers
results.creator_credit: John Paino, John Blair, Carly Wray and Warner Bros. Television
results.brief_description: When 2% of the world’s population abruptly disappears without explanation, the world struggles to understand just what they’re supposed to do about it. The drama series The Leftovers is the story of the people who didn’t make the cut.

constellations_other.name: The world's end
constellations_other.description: For people of colour oppressed by systemic racism, genre stories about the end of the world and cosmological monsters can be used to re-examine race and the injustices faced in real life.

results.creator_credit_for_label: John Paino, John Blair, Carly Wray and Warner Bros. Television
results.description:
When 2% of the world’s population abruptly disappears without explanation, the world struggles to understand just what they’re supposed to do about it. The drama series ‘The Leftovers’ is the story of the people who didn’t make the cut.

Based on the bestselling novel by Tom Perrotta, ‘The Leftovers’ follows Kevin Garvey, a father of two and the chief of police in a small New York suburb, as he tries to maintain some semblance of normalcy when the notion no longer applies.
description_for_label:
When 2% of the world’s population abruptly disappears without explanation, the world struggles to understand just what they’re supposed to do about it. The drama series ‘The Leftovers’ is the story of the people who didn’t make the cut.

Based on the bestselling novel by Tom Perrotta, ‘The Leftovers’ follows Kevin Garvey, a father of two and the chief of police in a small New York suburb, as he tries to maintain some semblance of normalcy when the notion no longer applies.

results.title: The Learning Tree
results.brief_description: The story, set in Kansas during the 1920’s, covers less than a year in the life of a black teenager, and documents the veritable deluge of events which force him into sudden manhood. The family relationships and enmities, the fears, frustrations and ambitions of the black teenager in small-town America are explored with a strong statement about human values.
results.description: The story, set in Kansas during the 1920’s, covers less than a year in the life of a black teenager, and documents the veritable deluge of events which force him into sudden manhood. The family relationships and enmities, the fears, frustrations and ambitions of the black teenager in small-town America are explored with a strong statement about human values.

results.title: The Lawnmower Man
results.brief_description: A brilliant scientist, obsessed with perfecting a revolutionary virtual reality software program, enlists the aid of a slow-witted gardener, only to encounter a shadowy group seeking to turn the “lawnmower man” into the ultimate weapon.

constellations_other.name: VR dreams
constellations_other.description: Since VR's inception creators have explored the ways VR could be used to enhance our lives and even extend them.

results.description: A brilliant scientist, obsessed with perfecting a revolutionary virtual reality software program, enlists the aid of a slow-witted gardener, only to encounter a shadowy group seeking to turn the “lawnmower man” into the ultimate weapon. Stars Pierce Brosnan with Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Mark Bringleson, Geoffrey Lewis.

results.title: The Last of Us Part II
results.creator_credit: Kurt Margenau, Anthony Newman, Neil Druckmann, Halley Wegryn Gross and Naughty Dog
results.brief_description: Five years after the events of The Last of Us, Ellie embarks on another journey through a post-apocalyptic America on a mission of vengeance against a mysterious militia.

constellations_other.name: Action, emotion and videogames
constellations_other.description: More and more, videogames are beginning to favour emotion as much as action, just like their film and TV cousins.

results.title: The Last Days of Chez Nous
results.brief_description: The story of sisters Vicki and Beth, when Vicki begins an affair with Beth’s intriguing French husband.

constellations_other.name: Jan Chapman
constellations_other.description: From an independent Sydney cinema to the world's stage, Jan Chapman's work has many connections to the Australian film scene and Hollywood.

results.creator_credit: Wonderland Films, Sidney Kimmel Entertainment, Participant Media, MacDonald/Parkes Productions, China Film Co-Production Corporation, Beijing Happy Pictures Cultural Communications Co., Kite Runner Holdings, Ebeling Group, Neal Street Productions, DreamWorks Pictures, Rebecca Yeldham, David Benioff, Marc Forster, William Horberg and E. results.headline_credit: Afghanistan, China and United States of America, 2007
results.brief_description: After spending years in California, Amir returns to his homeland in Afghanistan to help his old friend Hassan, whose son is in trouble.
